resources.string: 2. When you start the game on your phone, you will have ten (10) seconds to set up. No team should be in posession of the ball at this time.
3. When the Sphero turns your team's color, grab it and shake it as many times as possible. Ten (10) shakes will get you one (1) point.
4. When the Sphero changes colors, throw it into another part of the pool as soon as you notice, so the other team can get it.
Note: make sure the Sphero lands in the water.
5. The first team to 50 points is the winner! The winner's color will flash on the Sphero when the game ends.
